1010000110101001 0100010011101001 0 -> sum: 1110011010010010, cout: 0
0101010000001100 0010011101100011 0 -> sum: 0111101101101111, cout: 0
0111111011100100 1001100011100001 1 -> sum: 0001011111000110, cout: 1
